Text: kindve sucks that I cant add some of the songs to my ipod because my computer isnt authorized for ur account, since u bought them and all lol

Track 09 (Peephole) from the album "System of a Down" has a problem:  It skips BADLY at 3:50  :-(
Haven't listed to the rest of the albums yet but there may be other issues.  Beware.

Thanks for the upoad, but I'd recommend avoiding this one. It was taking me loads of time to organize tags and stuff, and songs are in all kinds of formats, including some that won't even play because of DRM. I eventually gave up.
